actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to repeal the act of January 11, 1971, amending the Food Stamp Act of 1964, as amended, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Repeals the amendments to the Food Stamp Act of 1964 that were enacted by the Act of January 11, 1971 (Public Law 91-671). Authorizes appropriations for the food stamp program of such sums as may be necessary annually for the program. (Amends 7 U.S.C. 2011-2025)

titles.title: A bill to repeal the act of January 11, 1971, amending the Food Stamp Act of 1964, as amended, and for other purposes.
